channel.title: Magexp and pray xp and range xp
channel.description: how do i lower mage xp and pray xp and range xp on a deltascape base?? loookeed everywhere

item.title: Magexp and pray xp and range xp
item.dc:creator: @dowon8 dowon8
item.description:
@dowon8 wrote:

For range, search for

TotalExp = (double) (90 * hitDiff); // added *2 for

You should see something similar to this

if (UseBow) { TotalExp = (double) (90 * hitDiff); // added *2 for TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double) (90 * hitDiff); // added *2 for TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff); // added *2 for TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff); // added *2 for TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

if (UseBow) { TotalExp = (double) (90 * hitDiff); // added *2 for TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);

That is Range XP change the “90” to the xp you want

Idk about pray xp but to change mage xp go to config:magicspells

Read full topic
item.source: Magexp and pray xp and range xp
